Owlhawk turns on his communicator.

Owlhawk:  Yes, but he was beyond hope.  He told me to leave him in a 
cave and let that be that.  He said Hot Rod should lead now.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Kup::
> 
> Kup's form was slower so he fell behind Owlhawk. Eventually he saw 
Owlhawk heading the other way, back towards the base. Kup turned 
around.
> 
> "Owlhawk, did you find him?" Asked Kup.
